name: INDeleteTasksIntent
desc: A request to delete one or more tasks.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(taskList: INTaskList?, tasks: [INTask]?, all: Bool?)
items.desc: Creates the intent object with information about the task list and the tasks to delete from it.

items.name: var taskList: INTaskList?
items.desc: The task list from which to delete tasks.

items.name: var tasks: [INTask]?
items.desc: The tasks to delete from a task list.

items.name: var all: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to delete all the tasks from a task list.
